short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends the URL of the current tab with a markdown link to NotePlan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly connect your web browsing with your NotePlan workflow. This extension allows you to instantly capture web pages as markdown links in your NotePlan notes or tasks.

Key Features:
- One-click sending of the current page URL to NotePlan
- Customizable link text and surrounding content
- Option to add as a todo item or plain text
- Works across all websites
- Fully configurable to match your NotePlan setup

Perfect for researchers, writers, students, or anyone who wants to streamline their note-taking and task management. Keep your ideas, resources, and to-dos organized in NotePlan without interrupting your browsing flow.

Boost your productivity by bridging the gap between web content and your personal knowledge management system. With NotePlan Link Sender, your web discoveries are just a click away from becoming actionable notes or tasks in NotePlan.

Note: This extension requires NotePlan app to be installed on your device.
